messages.message: When I upload an additional document, and there now two documents in the project folder, there is no easy way to select the one that I want to work on. Initially it will only want to show the first doc, exiting and going back to the landing page, and then re-opening the project only opens up the most recently added doc with no possibility of changing
@Bas if you click this button you should be able to select other docs. But I agree this UX could be improved to be more intuitive
Thanks @Matt Weaver I....did not see that.... :joy:
